input.sentences: there 's a whole world out there you do n't know about before having kids . for example | there 's information fairs .
i went to one at the library | and it was full of booth of people trying to convince me i needed their products or services .
my matty would be a slow learner if i did n't get leapfrog products !

output.sentences: There are many kids in the world.
Parents need products and services for all these kids.
Products to teach kids numbers and letters can be slow to make..
Special products for kids are sometimes used at daycares.
This pair of women are trying to sell information about their products to daycares.
